arStrings.szText: {c_important}Ice Blades's{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}[{SF_9}|1|]{/c} seconds each time it hits a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy.
{c_number}[{SF_10} * 100|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Enhanced Ice Blades's{/c} Cooldown reduction is applied to your other Skills.
Your {c_important}Ice Blades{/c} gain {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed per active {c_important}Ice Blades{/c}.
